author: Alex Black
title: Arla announces over 3ppl January increase | Farm News | Farmers Guardian
text: Arla has announced a 3.8ppl price rise for conventional milk from January 1. The cooperative has announced prices at 39.18ppl for conventional and 46.50ppl for organic milk. It followed its first price... To continue reading this article...
